attachments.title: VFX/Animation Showreel by Anthony Nikolaou 2019
attachments.text: Hello, I am a recent Animation/VFX  Graduate from the University of Greenwich and here is my graduate showreel. I am currently looking for a job in the VFX, Animation and Games industries as the skills I have accumulated thus far cover a plethora of industry roles.
